reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one mentioning it brings them back to 1975, and they appreciate its perfect length that hits right at the knees. The dress is comfortable, not itchy at all, and customers find it flattering, with one noting how it accentuates curves without being too revealing. They praise its quality, material, and color accuracy, and one customer mentions the stretchiness helps it fit well.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Lightweight, Flattering, and Perfect for Teachers & Summer Events!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! I ordered the Swiss Dot Khaki in Medium, and it fits true to size. For reference, I’m 5’2” and 140 pounds, and the fit is just right — flattering without being tight, and the length hits just above the knee, which is perfect for both comfort and modesty. The fabric is so lightweight and breathable, making it a great option for warm spring and summer days. It’s incredibly comfortable and easy to move in, which is important to me whether I’m spending the day walking around the racetrack or teaching in the classroom. I wore it recently to a day at the racetrack and felt so put together without sacrificing comfort. What I love most is that it also makes a super cute teacher outfit — professional, stylish, and functional. Just add flats or sandals and you're good to go! This dress checks all the boxes: flattering fit, beautiful style, and versatile enough for everything from weekend plans to school days. I’m already planning to buy another color! Read more
items.author: kyteecher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: Super cute! Perfect length for church, pictures, or everyday wear! I’m 5ft 6in and it hits me a couple inches above the knee. Has pockets also! Came wrinkled but a few minutes in the dryer solved this issue! Would definitely say it fits true to size. I’m 120 lbs, and a small was not too tight or too lose. Could be worn off shoulders also. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty blue dress
items.body: Very pretty color and dress. The material is material and light. True to size. Cleans easy. Read more
items.author: N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DO IT!!!!
items.body: I am beyond in love with this dress I wore it for my engagement party with cow girl boots it was so cute !! Fit perfect and very comfortable and stretchy ! Read more
items.author: Moore #Momlife Essentials

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fit like picture
items.body: I really wanted to love this dress and it looks so cute in the pictures but it is not as baggy in real life. The sleeves are much more narrow (still have some flow but not much) and the top elastic is much tighter than the picture shows. Not sure if you need to size up to get the look in the picture or if it just works better on women with less curves but not for me. Love the green color though and the pattern on it adds subtle interest which I like. Read more
items.author: Lior Ruiz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fits me and makes my waist look smaller
items.body: I adore the way this dress makes me look!!!! Read more
items.author: pastormom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, Cute, Functional
items.body: Super comfortable dress, perfect length, TTS, I’m 5’8, 34D, 155lbs, size L Read more
items.author: Lacey Goodson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect simple dress!
items.body: Perfect dress for my baby’s dedication. I think this is just a good classic dress to have. Fits well, seems flattering on anyone, love the sleeves, and it’s modest. Also has POCKETS!!! Read more
items.author: B Family

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bean Paste Red, Floral Red Pink, Floral Royal Blue, Blue, Floral White Red, Floral Blue Orange, Grey Blue, Floral Navy Purple, Army Green, Black, Floral Purple Red, Floral Brown, Floral Green Blue, Print Flower Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
